Body:
"""
            Create a Flask test application.

            :return: The newly created application instance.
        """
application = Flask(__name__)
application.config.from_mapping(EASYJWT_KEY=self.easyjwt_key,
    EASYJWT_TOKEN_VALIDITY=self.validity, SECRET_KEY=self.secret_key)
application.add_url_rule('/get_token/<int:user_id>', view_func=self._get_token)
application.add_url_rule('/validate_user/<string:token>', view_func=self.
    _validate_user)
return application
